SEARCH
Package database

Class AppointmentQuery

java.lang.Object
database.AppointmentQuery
public class AppointmentQuery extends Object
Class that contains sql queries logical implementation for creating / updating / deleting appointments from the database and the Application class.

  • Method Details

    • formatAppointmentTable

      public static void formatAppointmentTable(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Appointment> tableView)
      Dynamically creates and formats TableColumn instances for the TableView representing Appointment entities. Uses reflection to iterate over Appointment class fields and excludes those not meant for display.
      Parameters:
      tableView - The TableView to which the TableColumn instances will be added.

    • getAllAppointments

      public static void getAllAppointments(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointments, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Appointment> tableView)
      Retrieves all appointments from the database. Populates the provided ObservableList and TableView. Executes a SQL query to join appointments with contacts and orders results by Appointment_ID.
      Parameters:
      appointments - The ObservableList to store Appointment entities.
      tableView - The TableView to display Appointment entities.

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAllAppointments()
      Retrieves all appointments from the database and returns them as an ObservableList. Executes a SQL query to join appointments with contacts and orders results by Appointment_ID.
      Returns:
      ObservableList containing Appointment entities retrieved from the database.

    • getRangeAppointments

      public static void getRangeAppointments(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> appointments, javafx.scene.control.TableView<Appointment> tableView, String interval)
      Retrieves appointments within a specified time interval of either a week or month from the current day and populates the provided TableView.
      Parameters:
      appointments - An ObservableList to store the retrieved appointments.
      tableView - The TableView to display the appointments.
      interval - The time interval for which appointments are to be retrieved ("week" or "month").

    • getAppointmentsOfType

      public static void getAppointmentsOfType(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Appointment> tableView, String selectedType)
      Retrieves appointments of a specific type and populates the provided TableView.
      Parameters:
      tableView - The TableView to display the appointments.
      selectedType - The type of appointments to retrieve.

    • getAppointmentsOfMonth

      public static void getAppointmentsOfMonth(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Appointment> tableView, String selectedMonth)
      Retrieves appointments within a specific month and populates the provided TableView.
      Parameters:
      tableView - The TableView to display the appointments.
      selectedMonth - The month for which appointments are to be retrieved (format: "MM").

    • createNewAppointment

      public static boolean createNewAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, String start, String end, String contactID, String customerId, String userID)
      Creates a new appointment in the database with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the appointment.
      description - The description of the appointment.
      location - The location of the appointment.
      type - The type of the appointment.
      start - The start date time of the appointment.
      end - The end date time of the appointment.
      contactID - The ID of the contact associated with the appointment.
      customerId - The ID of the customer associated with the appointment.
      userID - The ID of the user associated with the appointment.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment is created successfully, false otherwise.

    • modifyAppointment

      public static boolean modifyAppointment(String appointmentId, String title, String description, String location, String type, String startTime, String endTime, String customerId, String userId, String contactId)
      Modifies an existing appointment in the database with the provided details.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to be modified.
      title - The new title of the appointment.
      description - The new description of the appointment.
      location - The new location of the appointment.
      type - The new type of the appointment.
      startTime - The new start time of the appointment.
      endTime - The new end time of the appointment.
      customerId - The new ID of the customer associated with the appointment.
      userId - The new ID of the user associated with the appointment.
      contactId - The new ID of the contact associated with the appointment.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment is modified successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeAppointment

      public static boolean removeAppointment(int appointmentId)
      Removes an appointment from the database based on the provided Appointment ID.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - The ID of the appointment to be removed.
      Returns:
      True if the appointment was successfully removed, false otherwise.

    • getAppointmentsOfCustomerID

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointment> getAppointmentsOfCustomerID(int customerID)
      Retrieves a list of appointments associated with a specific customer ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer for whom to retrieve appointments.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList containing the appointments associated with the specified customer. Returns null in case of an error.

    • getAppointmentsOfContactID

      public static void getAppointmentsOfContactID(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Appointment> tableView, Integer contactID)
      Retrieves appointments associated with a specific contact ID and populates a TableView with the results.
      Parameters:
      tableView - The TableView to be populated with appointment data.
      contactID - The ID of the contact for whom to retrieve appointments.

    • getAppointmentsWithCountryID

      public static void getAppointmentsWithCountryID(javafx.scene.control.TableView<Appointment> tableView, Integer countryID)
      Retrieves appointments associated with a specific country ID and populates a TableView.
      Parameters:
      tableView - The TableView to be populated with appointment data.
      countryID - The ID of the country for which appointments are retrieved.

    • getContactNameID

      public static void getContactNameID(javafx.scene.control.ComboBox<String> comboBox, String query, Map<String,Integer> nameIdMap)
      Populates a ComboBox with contact names and builds a mapping of names to their corresponding IDs.
      Parameters:
      comboBox - The ComboBox to be populated with contact names.
      query - The SQL query to retrieve contact names and IDs.
      nameIdMap - A Map to store the mapping of contact names to their corresponding IDs.
